CustomField.description: Indicates if date for last of four alerts for missing contracts has been passed Extended period to 180 days from 29:"Alert_Date_Missing_Contract__c + 29"
CustomField.formula: If(AND(Alert_Date_Missing_Contract__c < TODAY(), (ISBLANK(UploadTime__c )), Alert_Date_Missing_Contract__c + 180 > TODAY()), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.label: Alert Missing Contract LastDate
